member.name: P:Simple.OData.Client.ODataClientSettings.PreferredUpdateMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets a preferred update method for OData entries. The selected method will be used wherever it's compatible with the update scenario. If not specified, PATCH is preferred due to better performance.

member.name: P:Simple.OData.Client.ODataClientSettings.MetadataDocument
member.summary: Gets or sets the OData service metadata document. If not set, service metadata is downloaded prior to the first call to the OData service and stored in an in-memory cache.
member.value: The content of the service metadata document.

member.name: P:Simple.OData.Client.ODataClientSettings.ReuseHttpConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether connection should be reused between OData requests or disposed and renewed.
member.value: true to reuse between requests; false to create a new instance for each request.

member.name: P:Simple.OData.Client.ODataClientSettings.RenewHttpConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether connection should be disposed and renewed between OData requests.
member.value: true to create a new instance for each request; false to reuse between requests.

member.name: P:Simple.OData.Client.ODataClientSettings.UnqualifiedNameCall
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether should omit namespaces for function and action calls in generated URI.
member.value: true to omit namespaces for function and action calls in generated URI; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Simple.OData.Client.ODataClientSettings.EnumPrefixFree
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether should omit type prefix for Enum values in generated URI.
